{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.21550v1", "title": "Application of Betti Splittings to the Regularity of Binomial Edge
  Ideals", "summary": "In this paper, we use Betti splittings of binomial edge ideals to establish
improved upper and lower bounds for their regularity in the case of trees. As a
consequence, we determine the exact regularity for certain classes of trees.", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC", "published": "2025-04-30T11:49:09Z"}
